Text: @Gotoxytop1 Even gov hospital OPDs r closed whenever covid peaks nd happened in all hospitals just giving ER services. That doesn't mean they don't serve ppl but to curtail spread. To limit the OPD and IPD services they had to close for public. Similar happened in Fed Hospitals.
